entry.title: The Law as Teacher | Sabbath School Panel by 3ABN - Lesson 3 Q4 2020

media:group.media:title: The Law as Teacher | Sabbath School Panel by 3ABN - Lesson 3 Q4 2020
media:group.media:description:
Sabbath School panel discussion and insight by 3ABN pastors and teachers. This video follows 2020 quarter 4, lesson 3 of the adult Bible study guide book. This quarter's book topic is “Education” and this week's Sabbath School lesson is titled “The Law as Teacher”. Join us every week for fresh and relevant study of the word of God.
Reading: Deut. 6:5, 31:9–27, Rom. 3:19–23, Rev. 12:17, 14:12, Mark 6:25–27, Heb. 5:8
Memory Text: “You shall love the Lord your God with all your heart, with all your soul, and with all your strength” (Deuteronomy 6:5, NKJV).
(October 10–October 16)
Sunday (Shelley Quinn) - “To Love and to Fear God” Monday (Terry Shelton) - “A Witness Against You” Tuesday (Danny Shelton) - “That You May Prosper” Wednesday (Ryan Day) - “The Toils and Struggles of Law Keepers” Thursday (Jill Morikone) - “Jesus, Our Example”
🔴ONLINE SABBATH SCHOOL LESSON PDF https://absg.adventist.org/pdf.php?file=2020:4Q:SE:PDFs:EAQ420_03.pdf
🔗SABBATH SCHOOL PANEL WEBSITE: https://3abnsabbathschoolpanel.com/
🔗SABBATH SCHOOL PANEL PODCAST: https://3abn.org/ssp-podcast.html

entry.title: “Education options from a traditional Adventist perspective“ - 3ABN Today (TDY200041)

media:group.media:title: “Education options from a traditional Adventist perspective“ - 3ABN Today (TDY200041)
media:group.media:description:
Hosts John Lomacang and Jill Morikone will host segments about Christian Education. Randy Thornton from Milo Academy and Steve Baughman from Indiana Academy will be joining them to tell us about how important Christian education and what their schools have to offer. Stay tuned.

media:group.media:title: “Relevant Christianity“ - 3ABN Today Family Worship (TDYFW200029)
media:group.media:description:
What does the name Christian represent? Today Jason Bradley and his guests J. D. Quinn, Dee Hilderbrand, and John Dinzey, talk about what Christianity is really about. It is a program full of testimonies and stories of how God has worked in their lives. Are you a Christian? Stay tuned to find out!

media:group.media:description:

entry.title: The Family | Sabbath School Panel by 3ABN - Lesson 2 Q4 2020

media:group.media:title: The Family | Sabbath School Panel by 3ABN - Lesson 2 Q4 2020
media:group.media:description:
Sabbath School panel discussion and insight by 3ABN pastors and teachers. This video follows 2020 quarter 4, lesson 2 of the adult Bible study guide book. This quarter's book topic is “Education” and this week's Sabbath School lesson is titled “The Family” Join us every week for fresh and relevant study of the word of God.
Reading: Gen. 3:1–15, 2 Cor. 4:6, Luke 1:26–38, Matt. 1:18–24, Eph. 4:15, 1 John 3:18, Deuteronomy 6.
Memory Text: “My son, hear the instruction of your father, and do not forsake the law of your mother” (Proverbs 1:8, NKJV).
(October 3–October 9)
Sunday (Ryan Day) - “The First Family” Monday (Jason Bradley) - “The Childhood of Jesus” Tuesday (Jill Morikone) - “Communication” Wednesday (Kenny Shelton) - “The Role of Parents” Thursday (Shelley Quinn) - “Lest Ye Forget”
🔴ONLINE SABBATH SCHOOL LESSON PDF https://absg.adventist.org/pdf.php?file=2020:4Q:SE:PDFs:EAQ420_02.pdf
🔗SABBATH SCHOOL PANEL WEBSITE: https://3abnsabbathschoolpanel.com/

media:group.media:title: “The Two Covenants” - 3ABN Today Live (TDYL200032)
media:group.media:description:
The Two Covenants - Hosted by John Lomacang Is the Law of God still relevant, and does the Sabbath still have to be observed? Join us for an exploration of the Old and New Testament Covenants! With guests: Shelley Quinn, Ryan Day, and John Dinzey
